title: (x) Bruce Dickinson signature - Hand written {Mike Y}
content:
Hi, I'm new here. Can you help me identify the font used in this banner? (the handwriting font)Or maybe one that is very similar? Where can I find it?   
   
Thank you.   
   
 ![Banner](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054916im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/69504.jpg)\</font\>\</font\>
author: nando

comments.content:
It's hand printed. You can tell from the identical letters that don't look exactly the same.   
   
However, there are many fonts that might be similar enough, depending on what you want. See [Part 11 of the Script Font ID Guide](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054916/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/Script11Pg1.html) for some ideas. There's nothing downloadable there, but some of the fonts are freeware, and the sources are all identified in the Reference List that goes with the Guide.
